name: Wing Commander: The Secret Missions 2 - Crusade
name_original: Wing Commander: The Secret Missions 2 - Crusade
description:
Wing Commander: The Secret Missions 2 - Crusade is a simulation game developed by Origin Systems. It came out on 01-03-1991. It was published by Origin Systems.
You can play Wing Commander: The Secret Missions 2 - Crusade on PC.
It was produced by Chris Roberts, Jeff Johannigman, John Watson and Warren Spector. It was directed by Chris Roberts, Ken Demarest and Warren Spector. It was scored by Kirk Winterrowd.
